entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Corner Brook
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:36 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Corner Brook 12:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -8.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -10.9°C
Wind: SE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 20 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local blowing snow overnight. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
